title: Prize Portal rebrand (UI, copy, theme, and generated assets)

requirements.summary: Rebrand all existing flow screens to a cohesive Prize Portal look without changing the step flow behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The user journey and step transitions remain identical to current behavior.
No UI copy or assets reference TikTok or “Winner Verification Portal”.
All core screens (PrizeLookup, ActivationFlow, EligibilityFlow, IdentityVerification, ReceiptMethod, CompletionScreen) visually match the new Prize Portal brand.

file_operations.description: Update PrizeLookup visual styling (non-neon look) while keeping form submission and transitions unchanged; continue using shadcn/ui Card, Button, Input, Alert for consistent UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Activation screen styling to match Prize Portal theme (surfaces, borders, shadows, emphasis) without changing activation behavior; continue using shadcn/ui Card, Button, Alert. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Eligibility screen styling to match Prize Portal theme without changing checklist interaction or submission behavior; continue using shadcn/ui Card, Checkbox, Button, Alert. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Identity Verification screen styling to match Prize Portal theme (upload panels, borders, highlights) while keeping upload/preview/remove/submit behavior unchanged; continue using shadcn/ui Card, Button, Alert, Label. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Receipt/Delivery screen styling to match Prize Portal theme while keeping form validation and submission behavior unchanged; continue using shadcn/ui Card, RadioGroup, Input, Textarea, Button, Alert. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update Completion screen styling to match Prize Portal theme (success/ineligible/review states) while keeping reset behavior unchanged; continue using shadcn/ui Card, Button, Alert. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update header styling (background, borders, typography) to match Prize Portal theme without changing layout structure; continue using existing iconography and shadcn/tailwind utilities. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Update footer styling to match Prize Portal theme without changing existing referral link behavior; continue using tailwind utilities. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update all user-facing text to Prize Portal branding and ensure consistent English copy across the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Header title no longer says “Winner Verification Portal” and instead reflects Prize Portal branding.
Footer copyright line no longer says “Winner Verification Portal”.
All user-facing text remains English and consistent in tone with a Prize Portal.

file_operations.description: Replace 'Winner Verification Portal' title with 'Prize Portal' (or 'Prize Portal — Verification') and update logo alt text to Prize Portal wording. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace footer copyright text to reference Prize Portal (remove 'Winner Verification Portal') while keeping the existing referral link and hostname behavior unchanged. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update PrizeLookup hero/title/description/button text to Prize Portal tone (e.g., 'Verify Your Prize') and ensure all visible strings remain English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Review and adjust activation step labels and helper text for Prize Portal tone while preserving meaning and flow. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Review and adjust delivery method labels/descriptions to consistent Prize Portal English tone while preserving validation rules and behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Review and adjust completion-state messaging (claimed/under review/ineligible) to match Prize Portal tone while preserving state logic and actions. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

acceptanceCriteria: PrizeLookup hero image no longer uses /assets/generated/hero-cover-tiktok.dim_1600x600.png.
Icons/backgrounds no longer use TikTok/neon asset filenames (e.g., trophy-icon-neon, verification-badge-neon, face-verify-icon-neon, celebration-bg-tiktok).
All referenced generated assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and render correctly in the UI.

requirements.summary: Define and apply a Prize Portal visual theme (tokens + styling) that is consistent, not neon/TikTok-like, and avoids a blue/purple primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Global theme tokens (CSS variables) and common utilities reflect the new Prize Portal theme.
Key components (cards, buttons, alerts, headers/footers) use the new theme consistently.
The primary palette is not blue/purple and the overall look is not neon/TikTok-inspired.

file_operations.description: Replace TikTok/neon CSS variable tokens with a Prize Portal palette (e.g., premium gold/amber primary, neutral charcoal surfaces, subtle accent) for both :root and .dark; remove or repurpose neon glow utility classes so they no longer read as neon/TikTok-inspired.

Adjust extended Tailwind theme values (e.g., boxShadow glow definitions, animations, and optional font configuration) to align with Prize Portal (subtle premium shadows, no neon glow emphasis) while keeping existing token mapping to CSS variables.

Align header surface styling with the updated Prize Portal tokens (subtle borders, solid/blur surfaces if desired) using existing Tailwind utilities and shadcn/ui patterns. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Align footer surface styling with the updated Prize Portal tokens (subtle borders, consistent muted text styling) using existing Tailwind utilities. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Remove/replace TikTok-specific eligibility checklist copy with generic Prize Portal eligibility language without changing checklist behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Eligibility checklist items no longer mention TikTok.
Checklist still requires confirming all items before proceeding, as it does today.

file_operations.description: Edit the eligibilityRequirements strings to remove 'TikTok promotion' references and replace with generic Prize Portal eligibility statements; do not change checklist state handling, allChecked logic, or button enable/disable behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
